data.title: Princess Giovanna of Italy to Wed King Boris; Bulgarian Ruler Overcomes Religious Obstacles
data.meta_description: Betrothal to Princess Giovanna of Italy officially announced
data.text:

Princess Giovanna of Italy to Wed King Boris; Bulgarian Ruler Overcomes Religious Obstacles

Oct. 4, 1930

See the article in its original context from

October 4, 1930 , Page 1Buy Reprints

TimesMachine is an exclusive benefit for home delivery and digital subscribers.

Full text is unavailable for this digitized archive article. Subscribers may view the full text of this article in its original form through TimesMachine.

ROME, Oct,, 3.--The betrothal of Princess Giovanna, third daughter of King Victor Emmanuel and Queen Elena, to King Boris of Bulgaria was officially announced tonight. The Princess is 23 yearn old and King Boris, long known as the "Bachelor King." is 36. View Full Article in Timesmachine Â»
